sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; import CrimeServices from './crimeServices'; import CrimesComponents from './crimesComponent'; class CrimeDetails extends Component { state = { crime: { crime: { 'id':'', 'category_id':'', 'location_type':'', 'latitude':'', 'longitude':'', 'street_name':'', 'persistent_id':'', 'month':'' }, outcomes: [] }, disabled:true } async componentWillMount(){ const crime = await CrimeServices.crimeDetails(this.props.match.params.id); this.setState({ crime }) } handleEdit = () => { const disabled = false; this.setState({ disabled }); } handleSave = async () => { const obj = { 'id':document.getElementById('id').value, 'category':document.getElementById('category').value, 'location_type':document.getElementById('location_type').value, 'latitude':document.getElementById('latitude').value, 'longitude':document.getElementById('longitude').value, 'street_name':document.getElementById('street_name').value, 'month':document.getElementById('month').value } const crime = await CrimeServices.updateCrime(obj); this.setState({ crime }); const disabled = true; this.setState({ disabled }); ReactDOM.render(, document.getElementById('root')); } handleCancel = () => { const disabled = true; this.setState({ disabled }); } render() { const { crime, disabled:dis } = this.state; console.log(this.props) return (

CRIME DETAILS

OUTCOMES

{ crime.outcomes.map(outcome => ( ) )}
ID Category Month Person ID
{outcome.id} {outcome.category} {outcome.date_1} {outcome.person_id}
); } } export default CrimeDetails;
